participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Lila enjoys the simple pleasures of life and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: I live off the land and I'm content with my simple life. I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk. My boyfriend works for NASA. My father recently had a heart attack. I am a goalie.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: James is family-oriented with a sense of humor, balancing his demanding job and personal life with a positive outlook.
participant_2.background: I love my family, even though they are a little bit crazy. I went to Stanford. I went to the beach and ate a lot of watermelon. My favorite TV shows are ones that make me laugh and forget about my troubles. My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like.

content.text: Hey there! How was your day?
Hey there! My day was good. Went to the beach and ate a lot of watermelon. How was yours?
My day was good! I went for a walk and thought about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs.
That sounds really nice. I love walking. It's so relaxing.
It is! I like to listen to music and just zone out.
I can definitely relate to that. Do you have any favorite bands?
I love The Killers. They're my favorite band.
I've heard of them! I've never listened to them before. What kind of music do they play?
They're an indie rock band. They have a lot of great songs.
I'll have to check them out. I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
You should! I think you'd like them.
